name: Igor vs Zombies
description:
Igor vs Zombies

Take control over zombies to attack Igor, who just wants to clean his graveyard.

Controls

Left Mouse Click: 

  • Take Control over selected Zombie
  • Move to selected Position
  • Move to Character, attacks Igor automatically

Escape: Close Game

____________________________________

This is a small game made for the screamortality jam in March 2021.

Ithron and me did the coding. You can find him here: https://ithron.itch.io/

We used the Unity Engine with following Third Party Assets 

  • Voxel zombies: https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-zombies
  • Graveyard voxel: https://maxparata.itch.io/voxelgraveyard
  • Skybox https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...
  • Quick Outline: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/quick-outline-1154...
  • Particles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565
  • Sounds:
    •  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/horror-sfx-32834
    • https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/445983/
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/horror-ambient-sounds-pack-4...
